00011 // nonlinear.cpp*
00012 #include "tonemap.h"
00013 #include "paramset.h"
00014 // NonLinearOp Declarations
00015 class NonLinearOp : public ToneMap {
00016 public:
00017         // NonLinearOp Public Methods
00018         NonLinearOp(float my) { maxY = my; }
00019         void Map(const float *y, int xRes, int yRes,
00020                         float maxDisplayY, float *scale) const {
00021                 float invY2;
00022                 if (maxY <= 0.f) {
00023                         // Compute world adaptation luminance, _Ywa_
00024                         float Ywa = 0.;
00025                         for (int i = 0; i < xRes * yRes; ++i)
00026                                 if (y[i] > 0) Ywa += logf(y[i]);
00027                         Ywa = expf(Ywa / (xRes * yRes));
00028                         Ywa /= 683.f;
00029                         invY2 = 1.f / (Ywa * Ywa);
00030                 }
00031                 else invY2 = 1.f / (maxY * maxY);
00032                 for (int i = 0; i < xRes * yRes; ++i) {
00033                         float ys = y[i] / 683.f;
00034                         scale[i] = maxDisplayY / 683.f *
00035                                 (1.f + ys * invY2) / (1.f + ys);
00036                 }
00037         }
00038 private:
00039         float maxY;
00040 };
00041 // NonLinearOp Method Definitions
00042 extern "C" DLLEXPORT ToneMap *CreateToneMap(const ParamSet &ps) {
00043         float maxy = ps.FindOneFloat("maxY", 0.f);
00044         return new NonLinearOp(maxy);
00045 }
